about_the_game:
ToS EZ Slideshow allows you to put together a captivating slideshow effortlessly.

Features:

  • ✨ Seamlessly combine photos and videos into a live slideshow.
  • 🎵 Add a personal touch with your favorite music.
  • 🌟 Smooth transitions between images for a professional touch.
  • ⏱️ Customize the duration each image is displayed for.
  • 🎨 Change the background color to complement your content.
  • 🔄 Effortlessly rearrange images, videos and music within the slideshow.
  • 📥 Import images, videos and music from various locations on your computer.

ToS EZ Slideshow is perfect for a variety of occasions, including:

  • 💍 Weddings: Create a captivating slideshow of the bride and groom's journey together.
  • 🎉 Birthdays: Celebrate a loved one's special day with a personalized slideshow of their cherished moments.
  • 🎓 Graduations: Compose a nostalgic presentation highlighting the graduate's achievements and growth.
  • 💑 Anniversaries: Relive precious memories and milestones with a heartfelt slideshow.
  • 🎄 Holidays: Capture the spirit of the season by compiling festive photos into a delightful slideshow.
  • 🌹 Wakes/Funerals: Honor the life of a loved one by creating a touching slideshow that commemorates their memories and legacy.

With ToS EZ Slideshow, you can even enjoy your favorite memories while working, gaming, or simply relaxing, as the slideshow gracefully unfolds in the background.

Compatibility:
Images - .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .bmp
Videos - .mp4, .mov, .avi, .mkv
Audio - .wav, .mp3, .ogg

name: ToS EZ Slideshow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required if adding music
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: ToS EZ Slideshow allows you to put together a captivating slideshow effortlessly, perfect for a variety of occasions and you can even enjoy your favorite memories while working, gaming, or simply relaxing.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
